titles.title: 593 Thou Art Lord Control Our Will (a little work)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Thou art our Lord
Control our will
And keep each fleshly
movement still
What safety in
Thy rule is known
What sure salvation
As we own
Thyself as Lord

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Thou art our Priest
Thou dost sustain
Our hearts in either
Joy or pain
The holiest
Is now our place
Our hearts are drawn
There by Thy grace
For Thou art Priest

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
And Thou art Head
In Thee the mind
May wisdom and
Direction find
Love's own direction
For the heart
Now learns with Thee
Its heavenly part
With Thee the Head
